name: Monster (itch) (SmashArtist)
description:
You have a strange dream in the night beckoning you to the forest for a strange glowing star.

Be careful, there are monsters out there.

    

 GAMEPLAY

★ Explore the forest on your way to the star
★ Survive battles and collect items
★ Befriend Monsters to protect you on your journey

PLAYTIME

★ 30 min

 EXTRA INFO

★ Created for the Touch the Stars jam within one month
★ Created with RPG Maker MZ
★ Created without using any plugins
★ This is an early demo. There are many planned features which did not make it in.
      (for example you will see elements of the happiness system, but it doesn't do anything at the moment)

 Feedback is highly appreciated! 

CONTROLS

Keyboard:

 ★ Movement - Arrow Keys / Num pad
 ★ Accept - Z / Enter / Space
 ★ Cancel/Menu - X / Esc / Num pad 0
 ★ Sprint - Shift

Game Pad: 

 ★ Movement - D-pad
 ★ Accept - A
 ★ Cancel - B
 ★ Menu - Y
 ★ Sprint - X
